{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3529862,"name":"","username":"Kirill","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/k/a9a28c/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-17T11:30:13.560Z","cooked":"

Hi, my team and I want to make an Auto alignment to the Reef using Apriltags in Teleop, however we have some issues on how to implement and write it, could someone provide an example code or explain please?
Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-02-17T11:30:13.560Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":22,"reads":125,"readers_count":124,"score":135.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":492011,"topic_slug":"auto-alignment-in-teleop-using-apriltags-and-limelight","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":72128,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/auto-alignment-in-teleop-using-apriltags-and-limelight/492011/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3529901,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-17T13:37:27.855Z","cooked":"

There are several ways to accomplish this and it’s a hot topic here on CD recently. Search for the several threads about it. A few teams have even posted their code. There is a current thread with code from a team that couldn’t get it to work but it isn’t obvious that their approach is wrong and you might be able to use it. At the least start watching all the related threads for more ideas.

Help with using limelight Java
Hey, I,m from team 9028 G-Force. We decided to use limelight 3 this year and we also wrote a code for it but we are having some problems with automatic positioning in teleopmode. (simply the robot does nothing different than usual) We would really appreciate some help.

I think this github repository was posted yesterday as an example.
Programming-TRIGON/RobotCode2025-main
